Event.name: Tasting
Event.definition:
<def-root>An Agent ingests or begins to ingest a Food item that they have not had before with the intention of determining its quality on some scale. A Purpose for trying the Food may be explicitly mentioned.
<ex><fex name="Agent">Most people</fex> will never <t>try</t> <fex name="Food">dog</fex>.</ex> <ex><fex name="Agent">I</fex> <t>tasted</t> <fex name="Food">the soup</fex> <fex name="Purpose">to see if it had enough salt</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Agent
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The person who eats or drinks the <fen>Food</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Agent">Patty</fex> <t>tried</t> the sausage before serving it.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Food
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The entity being tasted or ingested by the <fen>Agent</fen>.
<ex>He <t>tasted</t> <fex name="Food">the soup</fex> and then added a tablespoon of salt.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Means
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The method in which the <fen>Food</fen> is eaten or drunk if not covered by the FE <fen>Instrument</fen>.
<ex>You should <t>taste</t> the wine <fex name="Means">by rolling it around your tongue a few times before spitting it</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Instrument
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The object that the <fen>Agent</fen> uses to try the <fen>Food</fen>.
<ex>John <t>tried</t> the soup <fex name="Instrument">with his stirring spoon</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Purpose
Arg.definition:
<def-root>A more specific description of what the <fen>Agent</fen> hopes to determine by trying the <fen>Food</fen>.
<ex><t>Try</t> the cabbage <fex name="Purpose">to see if it has enough salt</fex>!</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Time
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The time at which the <fen>Agent</fen> tries the <fen>Food</fen>.
<ex><t>Try</t> each dish <fex name="Time">before you serve it</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Place
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The location where the scene of an <fen>Agent</fen> trying <fen>Food</fen> occurs.\
<ex>Patty <t>tried</t> the sausage <fex name="Place">in the kitchen</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Manner
Arg.definition:
<def-root>A characterization of the <fen>Agent</fen> as they try the <fen>Food</fen>.
<ex>I <fex name="Manner">carefully</fex> <t>tasted</t> the piping hot casserole.</ex></def-root>

lexUnit.name: try.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: to engage in part or all of the eating process (in order to determine the quality of a food)

lexUnit.name: taste.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: to gauge gustatory sensations from a food item
